item.title: Grafana Alerts with SNS
item.description: Pre-requisites: AWS Account: You need access to your AWS account to create SNS topics. Grafana: Grafana should be installed and accessible. Permissions: Ensure that the user setting this up has appropriate permissions for AWS SNS and Grafana.

item.title: Kubernetes Installation On-Prem
item.description: This has been tested on a virtual environment, will be tested later on the definitive environment. Pre-requisites: Minimum specs: 2 CPUs 2 GB RAM 50 GB Storage Linux Distro: Ubuntu 20.04 (latest 22.04 present some issues and bugs) Docker Installation: First, you need to update the apt package index and install a few packages.
